title: How to Make Double Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookies

steps.headline: Cream the combined sugar, butter, shortening, egg, and vanilla in a large bowl.
Add the oats, flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt.
steps.description: Beat at a low speed until soft dough forms.

steps.headline: Shape dough into 1 1/4 –inch (3cm) balls.
steps.description: Place balls 2 inches (5cm) apart on an ungreased cookie sheets.

steps.headline: Press peanut butter cups into centre of each cookie.
Cool completely before storing.
steps.description: When cooled, take out and enjoy!

text: Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C).  Cream the combined sugar, butter, shortening, egg, and vanilla in a large bowl.  Blend in the peanut butter  Add the oats, flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt. Beat at a low speed until soft dough forms. Fold in your chocolate chips.  Shape dough into 1 1/4 –inch (3cm) balls. Place balls 2 inches (5cm) apart on an ungreased cookie sheets. Bake for 10 minutes  Press peanut butter cups into centre of each cookie.  Bake for an additional 2 minutes  Cool completely before storing. When cooled, take out and enjoy!
